results.name: Even bisection of A244226.
comment: Number of integers in the n-th run of successive integers having an "even" representation in the Greedy Catalan Base: A244222.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..7117
xref: Differs from A131718 for the first time at n=56, as here a(56) = 3 while A131718(56) = 2.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 23 2014
